sentences.sContent: They decided to swan around Italy this summer.
sentences.sCn: 他们决定今年夏天去意大利游逛。

sentences.sContent: French troops negotiated the Alps and went on the road in Italy.
sentences.sCn: 法军成功地越过了阿尔卑斯山脉，行军在意大利的国土上。

sentences.sContent: All the newspapers reported on the football match of France versus Italy.
sentences.sCn: 所有的报纸都报道了法国队对意大利队的足球比赛。

phrases.pCn: 小意大利（美国大城市的意大利移民区）
